title: The Intuitive Jira Guide For Users
summary: Jira is a self-hosted project management tool developed by Atlassian. It may seem a little daunting at first, compared to products like Trello or Asana, it comes with a lot more power and functionality packed in. But don't worry, Jira is actually a very intuitive tool. That's something you will discover while running through this guide for Jira.
